title.rendered: 30 Best 5 Star Hotels near me in Goa

content.rendered:
Goa is all about sun, sand, and beaches. Getting baked in the sun while watching the crashing waves of the Arabian Sea is an inexplicable experience. This beach capital of India and home to never-ending parties also displays a grand collection of rich heritage values and well-preserved culture. Its unique geographical features ranging from cliffs and lakes to lush forests and serene beaches, set it apart from other tourist destinations in India. It is an ideal place for families, groups of friends, and couples to spend some much-needed relaxing time. From the Goan cuisines to its warm welcoming folks, this place offers the perfect opportunity to create a lifetime of memories.

List of the 30 Best 5 Star Hotels near me in Goa

1. The Leela Goa, Cavelossim


Spread across a lush sprawling area of 75 acres, the Leela Goa is one of the most tastefully planned and designed 5-star hotels in Goa. Established in 1991, the Leela Cavelossim is one of the oldest 5-star hotels in Goa. Getting there from the airport is an experience in itself that takes you through an incredible landscape of postcard-worthy natural beauty. The Property displays a perfect blend of colonial architecture and contemporary Indian designs. Every aspect of the hotel showcases bespoke Indian artwork, lively lighting arrangements, and inviting lounging spaces. Relax at the private beach, exercise at the fitness center, or try out the delectable range of cuisines, one can never get bored at the Leela.

Cost: Rs. 10,334/-

Address: The Leela, Cavelossim, Goa 403731

Google Rating: 4.7

Suggested Tours

  • Goa Tour Packages
  • Goa Weekend Tour
  • Goa Honeymoon Tour

2. Taj Fort Aguada Resort And Spa, Candolim


With history woven into its walls and boasting a vibe of charm, romance, and vibrancy, Taj Fort Aguada is a must-stay for all luxury lovers. Frequented by royalty and some of the biggest celebrities in the world, the hotel lives up to its expectations of being truly one of a kind in North Goa. Known as the very first luxury hotel in Goa, the hotel occupies and displays a picturesque landscape and pleasing surroundings. Relax by the pool and look over at the 16th-century remains of the Portuguese fort nearby. Its nearness to the famous Sinquerim Beach makes this hotel all the more appealing.

Cost: Rs. 28,910/-

Address: Beach Sinquerim, Candolim, Goa 403515

Google Rating: 4.7

3. Vivanta Goa, Panaji


Ever since its establishment, Vivanta Goa has set the bar quite high for hospitality among the 5-star hotels in the Pnaji region. Every room and suite in the hotel offers spectacular views overlooking the city. This combined with the courteous staff makes for an indulgent stay. Jet lag after a long flight? Indulge yourself in the therapeutic massage and spa service. Weather getting too hot? Pamper yourself by taking a relaxing dip at the pool. The highlight of the hotel is the award-winning culinary basket of cuisines offered at some of the top-notch restaurants and cafes here. A wholesome experience is guaranteed! Go through the charming historically rich Panaji region with the help of our concierge service to bind the whole original Goan experience together.

Cost: Rs. 11,680/-

Address: St. Anne’s Junction, Off, Dayanand Bandodkar Marg, Panaji, Goa 403001

Google Rating: 4.6

4. Taj Exotica Resort And Spa, Benaulim


When it comes to luxury at its peak, Taj is the first name that comes to mind. Staying true to their image, the Taj Exotica resort and spa in Benaulim encapsulates the spirit and soul of Goa. spread out majestically in a whopping area of 30 acres the property consists of 500 exquisite rooms, 10 restaurants and bars, 3 outdoor pools, spa service, and other such celebratory spaces. The hotel brings together the best of both worlds experience by combining the old-world Portuguese charm with sophisticated brand-new chic styles. From family vacations to couples’ honeymoons and unforgettable wedding experiences, this hotel offers a plethora of experiences at its best.

Cost: Rs. 49,560/-

Address: Calwaddo, Benaulim, Goa 403716

Google Rating: 4.7

5. Grand Hyatt Goa, Fontainhas


Set against the coming waters of Bambolim Bay in north Goa, Grand Hyatt is an enchanting hotel destination that will capture your heart at first glance. Deeply inspired by the 17th-century Indo-Portuguese palace, the resort covers a massive area of over 28 acres. Every inch of the space is rich with sprawling lawns, tropical gardens, and rolling water’s edge. Every room at the hotel showcases spectacular views making your stay here absolutely worth it. Indulge in the real flavors of Goa at the many cafes and restaurants here. The fleet of staff here is considered the most welcoming and warm team in the hotel industry in Goa.

Cost: Rs. 18,851/-

Address: P.O, Goa University Road, Aldeia de Goa, Bambolim, Goa 403206

Google Rating: 4.6

6. W Goa, Vagator


W Goa is a beachfront resort exhibiting a multicultural trend throughout the property. Stroll under the moonlight night carefree at the private beach or take a dip in the Cliffside facade pool. Don’t forget to spend a day of self-care at the rejuvenating spa service. An appealing feature added to every room is a Portuguese style of balcony which amps up the beauty of the stay. From the linen that makes you feel deeply relaxed to the 24/7 hotel gym, one can have the time of their life at this unique hotel. Its nearness to various tourist spots makes it extremely convenient to go out and about exploring the wonders that this beach state has to offer.

Cost: Rs. 43,070/-

Address: Vagator Beach, Bardez, Goa, 403509

Google Rating: 4.5

7. Le Meridien, Calangute


Stay at the posh Le Meridien hotel and experience the rich beauty of North Goa like never before. The property is situated just a stone’s throw away from famous beaches, marketplaces, and other interesting tourist attractions. The decor and architectural style of the hotel attempt to capture the rich cultural heritage this state represents. Lighting up every corner of the hotel is plenty of natural light, local artwork, and music. The stay experience is further enhanced by the expert fleet of staff. Every room is decorated with classy touches of floor-to-ceiling windows and other upscale facilities and amenities like free WIFI service, spacious rooms, and more.

Cost: Rs. 9,439/-

Address: Aguada – Siolim Rd, Gauravaddo, Calangute, Goa 403516

Google Rating: 4.4

8. ITC Grand Goa, Utorda


Tucked away in the tranquil and utterly peaceful region of south Goa, ITC Grand Resort and Spa is a one-of-a-kind oasis. From the moment you step into the hotel, you will be filled with a deep sense of relaxation. Enjoy direct access to the private region of Arossim Beach and its lush 45 acres of beauty. The hotel also houses some of the award-winning, world-class restaurants and bars in the world. The luxury resort also offers several outdoor and indoor venues to indulge in special events and activities. If you get tired of all the goan sightseeing and exploration, get a chance to melt away the stress at the royal spa.

Cost: Rs. 30,090/-

Address: Arossim Beach Rd, Cansaulim, Arossim, Goa 403712

Google Rating: 4.7

9. Taj Holiday Village Resort And Spa, Candolim


Displaying an eclectic combination of Indo-Portuguese architectural heritage, the Taj Holiday Village resort is a luxury hotel like none other. The Romanesque arches studded with pillared verandahs and a posh central courtyard make this hotel the perfect getaway destination. Cocooned in dense foliage on one side and the beach on the other it also offers the best of both worlds. The goan paradise experience this 5-star hotel has to offer remains unparalleled. The highlight of this hotel is its 142 terracotta-roofed tranquil suites which deliver the perfect combination of contemporary luxury with nature. Head to this wellness resort and spa for a vacation in Goa like no other.

Cost: Rs. 25,370/-

Address: Sinquerim, Candolim, Goa 403515

Google Rating: 4.7

10. Cidade De Goa, Panjim


When it comes to Taj, luxury is the first thing that comes to mind. With immaculate attention to detail and extraordinary service, Cidade De Goa in Panjim is a must-stay option. Every room comes equipped with a personal safe, a minibar, and other such modern amenities. Its location close to Miramar Beach and Dona Paula Jetty makes it a convenient stay for travelers from all over the world. From engaging in relaxing yoga practices to never missing out on a workout at the state-of-the-art fitness center, Taj Cidade De Goa is a wholesome hotel.

Cost: Rs. 17,700/-

Address: Vainguinim Beach, Panaji, Goa 403004

Google Rating: 4.4

11. Hyatt Centric, Candolim


Situated in the heart of North Goa, Hyatt Centric offers the perfect Launchpad for travelers to explore various interesting and fun tourist sights this wonderful beach state has to offer. The hotel’s location in the middle of some of the most happening regions of the state giving off a vibrant energy and exciting attractions makes it a unique stay. Often referred to as the North Goan oasis Hyatt centric is known for its international restaurants and delicious bars. The best time would be to visit during the live music nights. Exploring the various sights of North Goa is now more fun than ever. Shop till you drop at the Mapusa marketplace or get in touch with the cultural heritage of Goa by going on nearby village walks.

Cost: Rs. 9,046/-

Address: Anna Waddo, Main, Candolim Rd, Candolim, Goa 403515

Google Rating: 4.4

12. Alila Diwa, Colva


Boasting 118 classy rooms, the Alila Diwa is a serene sanctuary. Start your Goa vacation on a high note by unwinding amidst the lush surroundings and a vibrant community. Explore the history of Goa through its old forts, colorful villas, and other such remnants of its rich colonial past. Swept in a whimsical green surrounding every villa here is famous for its high-pitched roofs, wide verandahs, tranquil courtyards, and other modern features. The contemporary Goan architecture adds a hint of rich vibrancy to the whole stay experience.

Cost: Rs. 27,140/-

Address: 48/10, Adao Waddo, Majorda, Goa 403713

Google Rating: 4.6

13. Taj Resort And Convention Centre, Panjim


Taj Resort is the epitome of grand architecture and pleasing hospitality at its best. Tucked away amidst the serenity of north Goa, this 5-star hotel is known for its iconic seafood restaurant, exciting lounge bar, and an elevated deck overlooking the stunning infinity pool. Encapsulating the rich spirit and soul of Goa is its amazing decor and state-of-the-art services. Guests can also enjoy complete access to a host of adrenaline-pumping water-based activities or go on enthralling sunset cruises and more. Be it soaking in the sun at the nearby Miramar Beach or indulging in exciting activities, this Goa 5-star hotel offers the best of both experiences.

Cost: Rs. 15,482/-

Address: Vainguinim Beach, Dona Paula, Panaji, Goa 403004

Google Rating: 4.8

14. The Crown Goa, Fontainhas


Overlooking the breathtaking views of the magnificent Mandovi River, the crown offers an enriching stay. Located in the capital city of Goa, Panaji, this Goan 5-star hotel is all about good times and good vibes. Featuring a wonderful outdoor pool, world-class restaurants, spa services, and more, the crown Goa has to be every traveler’s first choice of stay. Chill out at the poolside or relax your time away at the rejuvenating hanging garden, every inch and corner of the crown hotel exudes a sense of serenity and peace.

Cost: Rs. 6,575/-

Address: Bairo Alto, Rua José Falcão, Dos Pilotos, Road, Panaji, Goa 403001

Google Rating: 4.1

15. Doubletree by Hilton, Panaji


Doubletree by Hilton may be one of the most unique 5-star hotels in Goa. Nestled peacefully between the push forest and the calming waters of the Mandovi River, doubletree by Hilton is all about creating an environment of magical stay for every guest. Situated at a comfortable 10-minute distance from the UNESCO World Heritage site in old Goa it is also very close to Panaji and Miramar Beach. All your shopping, foodie, and nightlife needs are easily met here. Every room is uniquely designed with the latest modern amenities and luxuries, keeping the comfort of guests as a priority.

Cost: Rs. 9,440/-

Address: Kadamba Plateau, Old Goa Road, near Mandovi River, Panaji, Goa 403006

Google Rating: 4.5

16. The Postcard Velha


Had enough of the chaotic hotels and resorts of Goa? Looking for a quiet and peaceful luxury stay option away from it all? The postcard Velha is just the place for you. Tucked away in the peaceful world of old Goa, or as the Portuguese say, Velha Goa, the postcard is a charming hotel. Combining post-colonial sensibilities with modernity, the postcard is an idyllic getaway. Spread Out across an area of 2 acres one can enjoy the simple pleasures of Goa. All the sunkissed villas are snuggled comfortably in the forest shade, well-maintained gardens, and a stunning valley.

Cost: Rs. 26,550/-

Address: D-69/4/5 After Gandhi Circle, Before Church of Our Lady of Mount, Ella, Goa 403402

Google Rating: 4.8

17. Seashell Suites And Villas, Candolim


The boutique hotel is situated in the heart of Candolim. A great way to unwind and relax is to make your way to the stunning and charming seashell suites and villas. The hotel features 50 tastefully done suites, 15 modern spacious villas, 3 swimming pools, and an indoor multi-cuisine restaurant that will fetch a place in your heart. Every villa and suite is decorated with a welcoming vibe and an inviting decor that will make you feel right at home. Situated very close to Candolim on the Calangute strip this 5-star resort in Goa is made to keep you engaged throughout your stay.

Cost: Rs. 30,798/-

Address: Pintos Vaddo, Candolim, Goa 403515

Google Rating: 4.6

18. The Zuri White Sands, Varca


Known as Goa’s premier 5-star beach resort, the Zuri white sands in Varca will leave a lasting impression on your holiday plans. With 154 well-furnished and fully furnished rooms and 4 luxurious and highly modern suites, this hotel is one of the best 5-star stays in Goa. Each room boasts of being elegantly furnished with private balconies overlooking the beautiful surroundings. Some rooms even offer stunning views of the gardens, pool, and seas making every day here a treat. Have the fairy-tale vacation in Goa that you’ve always dreamt of with the Zuri white sands.

Cost: Rs. 15,029/-

Address: Pedda, Varca, Goa 403721

Google Rating: 4.4

19. Holiday Inn Resort Goa, Cavelossim


Overlooking the mighty Arabian Sea, the holiday inn resort Goa is a treat for your mind, body, and soul. Located at the stunning motor beach in Cavelossim, this is a one-of-a-kind, Mediterranean-themed inspired resort. The direct access to the beach makes the whole stay experience here all the more fun and wholesome. From its location to its top-notch services and modern amenities, Holiday Inn Resort in Goa is built to create a memorable holiday for everyone. Its convenient location from the international airport, sundown bar service, landscaped gardens, well-maintained pool, and more make for a time well spent in Goa.

Cost: Rs. 9,912/-

Address: Mobor Beach, Cavelossim, Goa, 403731

Google Rating: 4.6

20. Fortune Miramar Goa, Panaji


Fortune Miramar is the perfect choice for the modern-day traveler who loves to stay in contemporary-themed hotels and resorts. Boasting 45 top-notch and beautifully decorated rooms, a massive banquet service, and an enthralling vibe, this hotel has managed to stay in the top of the most loved hotels in Goa for a long time. The icing on the cake is the 24-hour multi-cuisine restaurant, a well-stocked bar and lounge, and of course, a contemporary bakery outlet to satisfy your sweet treat cravings.

Cost: Rs. 10,620/-

Address: Miramar Cir, Miramar, Panaji, Goa 403001

Google Rating: 4.1

21. Heritage Village Resort And Spa, Colva


The heritage village resort and spa in Colva is known as one of the best family resorts in Goa. If you and your family are looking to unwind from the chaotic bustle of city life, then head on to Goa for a memorable and relaxing stay at the heritage village resort and spa. The architectural nuances, Portuguese-inspired designs, and a vibe of exquisite luxury allow the guests to immerse themselves in the rich Goan culture. The heritage village is situated very close to some of the most popular tourist hubs of Arossim Beach and others.

Cost: Rs. 10,619/-

Address: Arossim Beach Road, Cansaulim, Arossim, Goa 403712

Google Rating: 4.5

22. Larisa Resort, Ashwem


Planning your dream vacation in Goa? Your search ends here. The Larisa resort is created with the inspiration being the endless skies and the mighty mountains. The design and crux of this creation are embedded in the bountiful earth that surrounds us. The philosophy of this resort comes from a sustainable and natural standpoint that combines with luxury. Every part of the property promises a serene and deeply luxurious experience with delectable dining options, soul-rejuvenating spa treatments, and other such luxuries.

Cost: Rs. 12,036/-

Address: Ashvewada, near Ashvem Football Ground, Mandrem, Goa 403527

Google Rating: 4.7

23. Goa Marriott Resort And Spa, Panaji


Looking to surround yourself with luxury but with a complete beach experience? Head on to the Goa Marriott resort and spa for a well-rounded stay experience. Located right on the edge of Miramar Beach offering some of the most stunning views of the Arabian Sea and Mandovi River, this luxury stay in Goa blends in award-winning hospitality with well-settled rooms and suites. Try out the delicious taste of Goa in their classy restaurant and awesome cafe. Enjoy the historic landmarks, surrounding areas of Panjim, and onshore and offshore casinos.

Cost: Rs. 22,768/-

Address: FRP5+HQW, Miramar, Panaji, Goa 403001

Google Rating: 4.5

24. Kenilworth Resort And Spa, Colva


Captivating the beauty of Goa with luxury and comfort is the Kenilworth Hotel Resort and Spa. Located in the south Goa region, this luxury 5-star hotel is a haven for comfort, luxury, and serenity at its best. Spend your time in leisure or indulge in corporate activities with Kenilworth. The hotel offers opulent accommodation options, chic dining spaces, fancy spa services, and a sprawling family-sized swimming pool. Situated conveniently 30 minutes away from the international airport of Goa, Kenilworth is the first choice among travelers from different parts of the world.

Cost: Rs. 15,998/-

Address: Kenilworth Resort & Spa, Utorda, Majorda, Goa 403713

Google Rating: 4.2

25. The Park Calangute Goa


Embodying the boho chic vibe of Goan culture, The Park Calangute is one of the best boutique hotels in Goa. The palm-fringed seaside hotel displays avant-garde art and design in every corner. Considered one of the top 5-star hotels in Goa, their rooms and suites boast of modern contemporary style of furnishings and classy-looking specs. The outdoor pool is a favorite among the guests who love to rejuvenate themselves here. Feel your stress melt away at the relaxing spa and get your sun tan on at the eclectic terrace space. Even a brief stay here will leave you spellbound.

Cost: Rs. 7,473/-

Address: Lane, Mall, opposite Calangute, Calangute, Goa 403516

Google Rating: 4.1

26. Lemon Tree Amarante Beach Resort, Candolim


The Lemon Tree Amarante Beach Resort is located just 250 meters away from Candolim Beach. It is also very close to all the famous beaches of Goa like Calangute, Baga Beach, Anjuna Beach etc. Its location has played a vital role in attracting throngs of travelers from all over the world. Uplift your spirits after a day out of explorations in Goa at Lemon Tree, because you and your family deserve the best. Each of the 65 rooms and suites at Lemon Tree is designed in a way that will make you feel right at home. Indulge your taste buds at the Pan Asian restaurant, at the eclectic bar, or the delicious coffee shop.

Cost: Rs. 5,685/-

Address: Vadi, Candolim, Goa 403515

Google Rating: 4.1

27. Radisson Goa, Candolim


Holiday like a celebrity at Radisson Goa in Candolim. Radisson is the epitome for redefining luxury stays in Goa. Located just 500 meters from Candolim Beach, 3 km from Calangute Beach, 4 km from Fort Aguada, and in similar proximity to other tourist hubs, Radisson Goa is a haven for travelers. Every room comes with a minibar, WIFI, a desk, a safety deposit box, and other such modern amenities that make a stay at this hotel truly memorable. Enjoy the authentic selection of Goan cuisines or try out the well-curated menu at the international restaurant. Radisson is as it is a very popular name in the hospitality industry and Goa, everything just seems much more fun.

Cost: Rs. 9,027/-

Address: Fort Aguada Rd, Bammonvaddo, Candolim, Goa 403515

Google Rating: 4.2

28. Planet Hollywood Beach Resort, Utorda


Spend the perfect Goan vacation against the serene backdrop of the iconic Utorda beach. Planet Hollywood at Utorda is all about sun, sand, luxury, and good times. This all-season exotic holiday beach resort is all about creating lifetime memories. Rooms are equipped with unique designs and features along with fun mood lighting. Choose from a plethora of room choices and book the one you find best. From meetings to wedding venues, planet Hollywood Beach Resort brings together the best of both worlds. The chalet at the retreat works as a level-up to your stay experience here.

Cost: Rs. 9,027/-

Address: 30/3, Acsona Waddo, Uttorda Beach, Utorda, Goa 403713

Google Rating: 4.5

29. The Westin Goa, Anjuna


With just a 15-minute walk from Ozran Beach, you will reach the Westin Goa, a paradise of a hotel. Situated very close to the vibrant Anjuna area, The Westin is all about good times and fun memories. Its location of being located very close to the sun-kissed beaches and the verdant green hills makes this hotel a truly wonderful stay experience for everyone. What’s better is the fact that the hotel actively takes care of the little ones traveling with families with their fun coloring activities to keep them engaged. The staff is helpful while the hotel is an experience in itself.

Cost: Rs. 28,910/-

Address: Survey No 204/1 Sub Division 1, Dmello Vaddo, Anjuna, Goa 403509

Google Rating: 4.6

30. Azaya Beach Resort Goa, Benaulim


The experiential stay paradise of Azaya Beach Resort in South Goa is all about drawing inspiration from the slow-paced, immersive stay. From the powder-soft sandy beaches to fresh, trendy, and soul-stirring views of the surroundings, Azaya is redefining the new age of luxury stays in Goa. Every one of the 114 rooms and suites designed here is impeccably and tastefully done to evoke a sense of peace and calm. Along with an incredible stay, the delectable culinary journey also awaits your arrival along with a deeply rejuvenating spa experience.

Cost: Rs. 19,559/-

Address: 336/0, Village Calwaddo, Benaulim, Goa 403716

Google Rating: 4.0

Some Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about 30 Best 5-Star Hotels in Goa

Q1. When Is The Best Time To Visit Goa?

Ans. Mid-November to mid-February is the best time to visit Goa.

Q2. Which Month Goa Is The Cheapest?

Ans. March and June are the cheapest months in Goa.

Q3. How Much Will 3 Days In Goa Cost?

Ans. 4 days and 3 nights in Goa can cost anywhere from 10,000 rupees to 15,000 rupees, depending on the kind of holiday.

Q4. How Much Money Do I Need For Goa Trip Per Day?

Ans. Per day in Goa, you may need about 2,000 rupees.

Q5. Which Are Some Famous Foods In Goa?

Ans. Feni, Bebinca, Vindaloo, Goan Fish Curry, Prawn Balchao, Crab Xec Xec, etc. are some of the most famous foods in Goa.

  • Best 5 Star Hotels in Jaipur
  • Best 5 Star Hotels in Gaya Bihar

Its unique geographical features ranging from cliffs and lakes to lush forests […]
